verbs.description: as [ARG1: halloween] [V: approaches] [ARG1: orpheum] theater opens up for ghost tours halloween is just a few weeks away and people are starting to stock up on candy and costumes meanwhile the orpheum theater in downtown phoenix is opening up for its ghost tours joe atreides phoenix john hook orpheum lake kari coordinator fox 10 kari lake orpheum theater
